title: Looking for ADC main
body:
Plat 5 looking for ADC main currently main Blitz/Karma/Raka. Skype/Discorde/Curse. 
The Sad King ign

replies.body:
I Would love a shot at it, i seem to be stuck in bronze with troll supp and raging kids, right positive attitude and can take criticism, don't say no  - give me a shot to prove myself and play a game or 2 with me.

main MF, Jhin or Cait - top heimy, illaoi, jung VI, Trundle - prefer ADC but would do any role

cheers

Lads..
